title: Healthy Hearts for Busy Bees
description: 2H2B is a nonprofit organization dedicated to campaigning and raising goods in honor of developing heart healthy practices easy to implement into busy peoples' lives. Help us by raising water bottles and low/no sodium snacks to donate to community centers.
volunteerGuide: Package 1 water bottle with 1 snack & donate to local center (hospital, food bank, etc.)
1 kit delivered = 1 hour of community service
